text: Salvatore Senese (3 April 1935 – 17 June 2019) was an Italian magistrate and politician. He was a member of the Democratic Party of the Left. From 1992 to 1994, he served as a member of the Chamber of Deputies. He served two terms as a Senator from 1994 to 2001. He was born in Tarsia, Calabria. Senese died on 17 June 2019 in Prato, Tuscany at the age of 84. ==References== ==Other websites== *Salvatore Senese – Chamber of Deputies profile Category:1935 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Politicians from Calabria Category:Jurists
title: Salvatore Senese
